name: Credrez
tag_list: hydrocarbon-resin, petroleum-resin, chloroacetic-acid, c5-hydrocarbon-resin, c5-petroleum-resin, c9-petroleum-resin, c9-aromatic-hydrocarbon-resin, c5c9-petroleum-resin, c9c5-hydrocarbon-resin, dcpd-resin, c5-resin, c9-resin, mthpa, mhhpa, dipentaerythrit
overview:
Credrez is a leading China manufacturer and supplier of Chloroacetic Acid,Hydrocarbon Resin,Petroleum Resin,Epoxy Curing Agent MTHPA and MHHPA which developed by the comprehensive utilization of the by-products of ethylene.

Our products include C5 Aliphatic Hydrocarbon Resin,C5 Petroleum Resin,Aromatic C9 Hydrocarbon Resin,C9 Petroleum Resin,C5/C9 Copolymerization Petroleum Resin,DCPD Hydrocarbon Resin,Hydrogenated Hydrocarbon Resin, Chloroacetic Acid,Monochloroacetic Acid,MTHPA and MHHPA.They have a wide variety of applications and are used in a number of industries such as Thermoplastic Road Marking Paint,Hot Melt Adhesives,Pressure Sensitive Adhesives, Rubber,Tire,Coating and Epoxy Curing Agent,Pesticides, Medicals,Dyestuffs,Oilfield chemicals,Paper-making industries, Foods and Textile industries,etc.

Besides the Hydrocarbon Resins,Chloroacetic Acid and the Epoxy Curing Agent MTHPA,Credrez is also well specialized in sales of basic chemicals,coating resin raw materials,Tackifier Resin,Dipentaerythritol,Pentaerythritol,Sodium Formate, Melamine,Monochloroacetic acid and HCPE.

Credrez, your global chemical source, expects to grow together with you.
